title: 06. Meaty - Divtober 2022
description: This entry for #Divtober 2022 was the first I did'nt create a Figma design for first, but rather just tried to recreate an image I found online: https://www.dreamstime.com/stock-illustration-bakery-shop-building-facade-signboard-flat-style-illustration-icon-eps-vector-image65609639.
